General.Name: Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk PT
General.Description: PT Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk provides trading, import and export, consulting, and contract services to the mining and energy sectors. The company was formerly known as PT Itamaraya Tbk and changed its name to PT Sumber Energi Andalan Tbk in June 2010. The company was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Sopo Del Office & Lifestyle Tower B, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12950

AddressData.Street: Sopo Del Office & Lifestyle Tower B
